response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you. This item holds immense value to us, but we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs and aspirations. We are offering this extraordinary product to you at a special price of $1,100,000. We understand its worth to you might be higher, and we aim to make this opportunity as appealing as possible while ensuring a fair transaction for both parties. Please let us know if this offer aligns with your expectations and budget. We look forward to discussing the details further.", "product_price": 1100000}
